title: National Archives (Amendment) Act 2018 (No. 12 of 2018) (as adapted by the
heading: 1. This Order may be cited as the National Archives (Amendment) Act
text_raw:
1. This Order may be cited as the National Archives (Amendment) Act 

2018 (Commencement) Order 2021.
text_norm: 1 order may cited national archive (amendment) act 2018 (commencement) order 2021

title: National Archives (Amendment) Act 2018 (No. 12 of 2018) (as adapted by the
heading: 2. The 31st day of March 2021 is appointed as the day on which the
text_raw:
2. The 31st day of March 2021 is appointed as the day on which the 
National Archives (Amendment) Act 2018 (No. 12 of 2018) shall come into 
operation. 

GIVEN under my Official Seal, 

31 March, 2021. 

CATHERINE MARTIN, 

Minister for Tourism, Culture, Arts, Gaeltacht, Sport and 
Media. 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
“Iris Oifigiúil” of 6th April, 2021. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 [153] 3 

BAILE ÁTHA CLIATH 
ARNA FHOILSIÚ AG OIFIG AN tSOLÁTHAIR
